name: Bubble Wheel - Careless Jounce and Spring Back of Bubbly Fun!
name_original: Bubble Wheel - Careless Jounce and Spring Back of Bubbly Fun!
description:
Spinning is super fun that will make you go crazy. But what if it’s unstoppable? How fun could it be, and how much crazier could it get?! If you love spinning, then this game is for you!

Spinning bubbles everywhere!! Not all bubbles pop! A few of them just love spinning like crazy!

Super fun game - easy at first but gets trickier as you move on to the next higher levels... Its super addictive too, you want to play more levels that you don’t want to put your phone down!!

But how prepared are you for this unstoppable fun spinning game? Can you get farther in this crazy, colorful land of bubbles? Catch items to boost speed on your way!

Sometimes, missions aren't so important when you just want to have fun!! Download this super fun and unstoppable spinning game now to enjoy the following features:

» Beautiful and colorful graphics!
» Cool sounds!
» SUPER FUN AND CRAZY APP!
» Unstoppable SPINNING GAME!
» SUPER ADDICTIVE AS LEVEL BECOMES TRICKIER!

Note there are no in app purchases in this app but it is advert supported :)

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
